metadata.title: Newcastle Brown Ale Cotton Bar Towel (pp) by signs-unique
features: 100% cotton bar towel to protect your bar surface from wet glasses

description: 100% cotton bar towel just like they have down the pub! 525mm x 250mm (21" x 10") Licensed
